moves.4. Qd1: not so good, better i think was Qa4 which would have been very hard to hit.
moves.6. h3: that was unnecessary because if bg4 then black can just play f3.
moves.10... Bd7 11. f4: white has to play aggressive to win.
moves.13. Kh1 Ne8: a good move otherwise the knight was completely useless
moves.14... gxf5: it was probably better not to take but wait for FxG6 then recapture with HxG6.
moves.15. exf5 e6: blacks king is now too open.
moves.19... Qxc3 20. f6: game over no way to stop mate.
moves.20... Nb4 21. Qxg7#: CHECKMATE good game by both players.
